issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Add SQL support for IN expression
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10731](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10731). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should add support for the SQL "IN" expression.

See TPC-H query 12 for a good example:
```java

WHERE l_shipmode IN ('MAIL', 'SHIP') 
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10731?focusedCommentId=17332312) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-datafusion/issues/118
